description: Episode of Series "Horizon". Shaken by the recent fuel crisis the notoriously conservative motor industry is at last giving serious attention to the question of fuel economy. The answer they believe lies in body shapes. Horizon looks at some recent alternatives to conventional shapes from Britain, Germany and Italy.
